Comment: Jointly with the Committee on General Welfare.

Items.Title: Oversight - Update on the City's Efforts to End Veterans' Homelessness.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Update on the City's Efforts to End Veterans' Homelessness.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on General Welfare

Resolution calling on Congress to pass, and the President to sign, legislation that allows service members, veterans and eligible surviving spouses to use the United States Department of Veteran Affairs home loans to purchase cooperative apartments.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Legislation that allows service members, veterans and eligible surviving spouses to use the US Department of Veteran Affairs home loans to purchase cooperative apartments.

Items.Title: Resolution reaffirming New York City’s status as a Purple Heart City and calling on the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign A.7961/S.2279, designating the State of New York a Purple Heart State.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Designating the State of New York a Purple Heart State. (A.7961/S.2279)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Dinowitz, Brewer. Ayala, Hudson, Stevens, Osse, Lee, Williams, Riley,  Ung, Restler and Riley
